SELECT a.history_id AS historyId, a.project_id AS projectId, p.title AS title, p.end_date AS endDate, a.exp_point AS expPoint FROM exp_history a JOIN project p ON a.project_id = p.project_id WHERE a.member_id = 4
UNION ALL
SELECT a.history_id AS historyId, a.project_id AS projectId, NULL AS title, t.date AS endDate, a.exp_point AS expPoint FROM exp_history a JOIN task t ON a.member_id = t.member_id WHERE a.project_id IS NULL AND a.member_id = 4
ORDER BY endDate DESC LIMIT 3;
